column4: can anyone help me install a screencam software such as hypercam/camistia on ubuntu linux?
Are there any screencam programs in the Add/Remove Software?
I will look
There are more programs in Synaptic, if you know in advance what you'll need.
i'm not sure if there is any out there for linux
i was hoping someone in here would know
So what will the screencam do? It's not a webcam, is it? Is it a screen recorder?
Perhaps we can find what you need
yes, such as hypercam
it records your screen into a video format
Mmm, I see
I know I've seen a good program for this
I'm trying to find it
i found this one called Xvidcap. but all the downloads are in i386 architechture
i need the lower one
i am running a 32 bit OS
You need this for x86, 32 bit? Is that right?
32bit
Well, here is something: http://linuxmafia.com/faq/Apps/screen-capture.html Are any of these similar to what you need?
i will look thank you
not that i can see
something like this but in a 32bit format. http://xvidcap.sourceforge.net/#xvidcap_live:
